# EquatableComparisonOperator.equalTo

**Case**

An operator that determines if the parameter and the value are equal.

## Declaration

```swift
case equalTo
```

## Equatable operators

- **EquatableComparisonOperator.notEqualTo**: An operator that determines if the parameter and the value aren’t equal.

items.description: An operator that determines if the parameter and the value aren’t equal.
items.name: EquatableComparisonOperator.notEqualTo
